name: imdb_search
description: Search for movies, TV shows, and people on IMDb. Returns up to 15 results with title, year, type, rating, and URL.

steps.code: const results = []; const items = document.querySelectorAll('[class*="ipc-metadata-list-summary-item"], [class*="find-result-item"], [class*="findResult"]'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(items.length, 15); i++) { const el = items[i]; const titleEl = el.querySelector('a[href*="/title/"], a[href*="/name/"]'); const yearEl = el.querySelector('[class*="year"], [class*="secondary"] span, li'); const imgEl = el.querySelector('img'); const typeEl = el.querySelector('[class*="type"], [class*="genre"]'); results.push({ title: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : '', year: yearEl ? yearEl.textContent.trim() : '', type: typeEl ? typeEl.textContent.trim() : '', url: titleEl ? titleEl.href : '', image: imgEl ? imgEl.getAttribute('src') : '' }); } return { query: `{{query}}`, result_count: results.length, results: results }
steps.name: search_results
steps.label: Extract search results
